document.full_text: sales of newly built single-family homes rose for a second straight month in april and supply was the lowest in a year, but an overhang of previously owned houses on the market could hobble recovery.
document.title: new home sales rise, but signal no recovery yet
lines_and_colors: sales of newly built single-family homes rose for a second straight month in april and supply was the lowest in a year, but an overhang of previously owned houses on the market could hobble recovery.
